SubjectRegulations Amending the Statistics Canada Census-Related Term Employment Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the STATISTICS CANADA CENSUS-RELATED TERM EMPLOYMENT REGULATIONS, in order to change the application of the regulations to employees who conduct work in support of the censuses or the National Household Survey (NHS).
